abstract: Melanie Simon uses her magic machines to coax youth from even the most stubborn complexions.
snippet: Melanie Simon uses her magic machines to coax youth from even the most stubborn complexions.
lead_paragraph: Known for electric facials that make A-list clients look as if they've had face-lifts, Melanie Simon uses her magic machines (and Circ-Cell, her product line) to coax youth from even the most stubborn complexions. Go to circcell.com.
